summary: TAKATA RECALL REPAIR WAS DONE ON 7/8/17 AT THE INFINITI DEALERS IN MARIETTA, GEORGIA. AS A RESULT MY DASHBOARD WAS DAMAGED ON THE PASSANGER SIDE NEAR THE THE BUNT ON THE DASHBOARD. THE DAMAGE WAS NOT THERE BEFORE THE WORK WAS DONE. I WAS SO UPSET ABOUT THIS! I WAS NOT INFORMED THAT DAMAGE WOULD OCCUR DUE TO THE REPAIRS THAT NEEDED TO BE DONE FOR THE AIRBAG REPLACEMENT. I HAD NO IDEA WHAT WOULD HAPPEN. GOT MY CAR AND A BOLT WAS LEFT LYING ON THE FLOOR. I DID MAKE THE SERVICE REPRESENTATIVE WELLS WALKER AND HE SAID THEY USED ANOTHER BOLT THEY COULDN'T FIND THAT ONE BUT IT WAS RIGHT ON THE PASSENGER SIDE FLOOR?! THE DASHBOARD HAD SOME CRACKS BUT NOTHING LIKE WHAT THE PIECED TOGETHER AND GAVE ME MY CAR BACK. THIS IS A DIRECT RESULT FROM REPLACING THE AIRBAG. WHY IS IT GOING YO COST ME?? I DID NOT BREAK MY DASHBOARD. HELP. WHAT CAN I DO?
